attributes.action: children 13 and up should be aloud to purchase a vape
attributes.background: here me out we can all agree smokings horrible since it causes cancer. But younger people think it's cool to do it so I think letting 13 year olds buy vapes will help because if they think it's cool it's not as bad. Vaping isn't dangerously harmful witch is better for minors

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you want to prevent young people from taking up smoking by allowing them to vape instead, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what type of vapes you want young people to be able to buy and use, for example whether they should be able to but and use nicotine vape products from the age of 13.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
